sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; export const indonesiaOnlineTerms = ( <>
Before proceeding, please read and agree to the following Terms & Conditions for Online Participants (Indonesia):
  • Participants who fail to submit the required documents (Extended Abstract and PowerPoint) after two reminders will be considered to have withdrawn automatically.
  • Participants must ensure that the title and extended abstract are relevant to the selected category. All documents must be written in English for international participants.
  • The committee’s decisions are final and cannot be contested.

Additionally, please note that each event will be submitted for curation through SIM T Puspresnas.

However, the outcome of the curation process is entirely under the authority of Puspresnas and cannot be contested by any party. Therefore, no objections or complaints regarding the results will be accepted.

); export const indonesiaOfflineTerms = ( <>
Before proceeding, please read and agree to the following Terms & Conditions for Offline Participants (Indonesia):
  • Participants who fail to submit the required documents (Extended Abstract and Poster) after two reminders will be considered to have withdrawn automatically.
  • Participants must ensure that the title and extended abstract match the selected category. All documents must be in English for international participants.
  • Participants must prepare a poster in A0 size, bring their product, and provide a printed copy of the paper/extended abstract during the judging session.
  • Awards will be presented according to the schedule. Participants may not request their awards before the scheduled time.
  • All participants are required to attend the entire event as scheduled by the organizing committee.
  • Participants eligible for special awards (Best Booth, Best Poster, Best Presentation, Best Project, Cash Prizes, Semi Grand Award, and Grand Award) must attend the awarding ceremony. Failure to attend will result in forfeiture of the award.
  • The committee’s decisions are final and cannot be contested.

Additionally, please note that each event will be submitted for curation through SIM T Puspresnas.

However, the outcome of the curation process is entirely under the authority of Puspresnas and cannot be contested by any party. Therefore, no objections or complaints regarding the results will be accepted.

); export const internationalOnlineTerms = ( <>
Please read and agree to the following Terms & Conditions for Online Participants (International):
  • Participants who fail to submit the required documents (Extended Abstract and PowerPoint) after two reminders will be considered to have withdrawn automatically.
  • The title and extended abstract must correspond with the selected category. All documents must be in English.
  • The committee's decisions are final and cannot be contested.
); export const internationalOfflineTerms = ( <>
Please read and agree to the following Terms & Conditions for Offline Participants (International):
  • Participants who fail to submit the required documents (Extended Abstract and Poster) after two reminders will be considered to have withdrawn automatically.
  • The title and extended abstract must correspond with the selected category. All documents must be in English.
  • Participants must prepare a poster in A0 size, bring their product, and provide a printed version of the paper/extended abstract during the judging session.
  • Awards will be presented according to the scheduled order. No early requests for awards will be permitted.
  • Participants are required to attend all sessions as scheduled by the organizing committee.
  • Participants eligible for special awards (Best Booth, Best Poster, Best Presentation, Best Project, Cash Prize, Semi Grand Award, and Grand Award) must attend the awarding ceremony. Failure to do so will result in forfeiture of the prize.
  • The committee's decisions are final and cannot be contested.
);
